# `FormPage` Definition

A page in a form with title, subtitle, and components

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| title | `string` | Yes | Title of the page |
| subtitle | `string` | Yes | Subtitle of the page |
| pageComponents | [`FormPageComponent[]`](formpagecomponent-definition.md) | Yes | Components on this page |
